virgile_p.name: Virgile P., Barber
virgile_p.comment: Excellent experience with Mathieu. The website he created is both aesthetic and functional. The custom booking section was thought out down to the smallest detail and greatly facilitates managing my clients. Professional, responsive, and attentive. I highly recommend!

ibrahim_b.name: Ibrahim B., UX/UI Designer
ibrahim_b.comment: I worked with Mathieu for over 3 years at Extia, in the Vamos team, where he was a React front-end developer on our internal CRM. He’s dedicated, reliable, always attentive, and takes feedback constructively, which really shows in the quality of his work. Beyond being a great developer, he’s friendly, helpful, and brings a positive vibe to the team. It was a real pleasure working with him. I highly recommend him!
